properties.tree_description: None Reason for Removal:OtherComments:This tree has an unbalanced canopy with a distributed load oriented toward the residence. High in the canopy on the tension side of the central leader is an irregularly shaped fusiform canker. The canker occupies a substantial portion of the affected stem circumference and is associated with an older dead branch. The infection has extended into the holding wood of the adjacent scaffold branch, and there is visible progression into a scaffold branch above.
